name: Mamere
title: Mamere
desc: A Melusine that paints every day. \n"Because painting the things that I want to brings me happiness!"

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After you play a Food/Location/Companion/Item Action Card other than Mamere: Randomly create 1 Food/Location/Companion/Item Action Card other than Mamere, and add it to your hand. (Once per Round).<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF"><span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s): 3
